turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to understand why my AR claim was denied. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can certainly help with that. To begin, please provide your claim number and the date of service.  I can then access the denial information.  Please note that some details are simplified for privacy.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the claim number is 1234567890 and the date of service was 2023-10-27. I'm really frustrated; I need this payment to come through!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am sorry to hear of your frustration. After reviewing the claim, it appears the denial reason is 'missing documentation.' The specific documentation required was the supporting medical records for the service provided. Do you have those available? If you do, you should submit those to the insurance company as soon as possible. I can give you the contact info for the insurance company.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's... interesting. I *did* submit the medical records. Is it possible there was a technical issue, or maybe the wrong records were attached? And how can I possibly know which specific records they think are missing? Also, is there a way to have this processed quickly, because I have bills to pay.
